Title: MultiSelectDropdownExtender
Description: An extender control that extends a Textbox and a Listbox to produce a multi-select dropdown. It is reliant on the AjaxControlToolkit.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
An extender control that extends a Textbox and a Listbox to produce a multi-select dropdown. It is reliant on the AjaxControlToolkit.

It is a solution to this workitem:

http://www.codeplex.com/AtlasControlToolkit/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=11907
